Title: Top Indian scientists join global fight against coronavirus - Hindustan Times
Description: The National Institute of Immunology in Delhi will sequence the virus to see whether the one  infecting travellers from different parts of the world is the same or has undergone changes.

Title: Test at home for coronavirus infection in 10 minutes, NIV Pune approves Singapore company's test kit - India TV News
Description: The Singapore-based company claims that its test kit can test the COVID-19 in 10 minutes from home. In the present circumstances this kit can provide relief to millions who fear corona virus.

Title: A heart attack? No, it was coronavirus - Times of India
Description: US News: The 64-year-old patient arrived at a hospital in the New York City with symptoms looking like those seen in patients having a serious heart attack.

Title: Coronavirus Pandemic: Baby dies after testing positive for Covid-19 in US; death toll crosses 2,000-mark - India TV News
Description: An infant who had tested positive for COVID-19 has died, the first known death of a child younger than a year old infected with the virus in the United States.

Title: Indian scientists imaged novel Coronavirus under a high-powered microscope - Tech Explorist
Description: Using transmission electron microscopy (TEM), scientists from the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR), managed to image the novel coronavirus.
